thread.title: Amazing service, great location
thread.title_full: Amazing service, great location - Review of Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: sophiacoy
title: Amazing service, great location
text: I stayed here for a few days on a business trip - the staff is incredibly service oriented, always one step ahead of you in terms of what you may need or want. Quiet, modern, great location. The restaurant is excellent, the bar makes killer drinks.
